changeSet.author: alexander.kuznetsov
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE public.sample_tab_key_seq INCREMENT 1 MINVALUE 1 START 1;

changeSet.author: alexander.kuznetsov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE sample ( tab_key int4 DEFAULT nextval('sample_tab_key_seq') NOT NULL, refid int4 NOT NULL, lab_ogrn int4, pid varchar(20) NOT NULL, card_num varchar(20), fam varchar(25), name varchar(20), otch varchar(40), birthday date, sex int4, cycle varchar(1), pregn int4, hiv_cont varchar(6), cat_id varchar(5), category varchar(60), blood int4, drugs varchar(50), dep_id int4, dep_ogrn int4, depart varchar(60), room varchar(10), doc_id varchar(20), doc_name varchar(50), diagn varchar(7), ser_ins varchar(20), num_ins varchar(20), k_ins varchar(6), insurer varchar(60), ser_p varchar(10), num_p varchar(20), address varchar, sampdate date, cito bool, flag bool, wdate timestamp(6), rdate timestamp(6), error varchar, lab_id int4, CONSTRAINT sample_pkey PRIMARY KEY (tab_key) );

changeSet.author: alexander.kuznetsov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE orders ( tab_key int4 NOT NULL, stype int4, targ_id varchar(4), target varchar(50), orderid varchar(10) NOT NULL, flag bool, sample_id int4, cito BOOLEAN, CONSTRAINT tab_key_to_sample_fk FOREIGN KEY (tab_key) REFERENCES public.sample (tab_key) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT order_to_sample_fk FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES public.sample (tab_key) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION );

changeSet.author: alexander.kuznetsov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE result( tab_key int4 NOT NULL, refid int4 NOT NULL, sid int4 NOT NULL, pid varchar, card_num varchar, tstg_id int4 NOT NULL, tstg_name varchar(30), tst_id int4 NOT NULL, tst_mn varchar(17), tst_name varchar(80), res varchar(15), rem varchar(40), unit varchar(40), l_ref varchar(40), h_ref varchar(40), tst_note varchar, tst_date timestamp(6) NOT NULL, path varchar, flag bool NOT NULL, wdate timestamp(6) NOT NULL, rdate timestamp(6) NOT NULL, error varchar, CONSTRAINT tab_key_to_sample_fk FOREIGN KEY (tab_key) REFERENCES public.sample (tab_key) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION );
